thread.title: LG Electronics Soars Most Since 2008 After Striking GM Bolt Deal - Bloomberg Business
thread.title_full: LG Electronics Soars Most Since 2008 After Striking GM Bolt Deal - Bloomberg Business

author: yahoo
title: LG Electronics Soars Most Since 2008 After Striking GM Bolt Deal - Bloomberg Business
text:
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on WhatsApp Share on LinkedIn Share on Reddit Share on Google+ E-mail Share on Twitter Share on WhatsApp LG Electronics Inc. climbed by the most in seven years in Seoul trading after the South Korean electronics maker struck a deal to co-develop General Motors Co.â€™s Bolt electric vehicle.
The shares jumped 14 percent, the most since 2008, to close at 53,600 won. The stock has slumped 9.3 percent since the beginning of the year.
GM and LG struck their partnership as carmakers around the world are trying to develop more fuel-efficient vehicles. Tesla Motors Inc. has drawn customers with its sporty electric vehicles, while Toyota Motor Corp. has begun marketing its hydrogen fuel-cell Mirai.
